name: thomashuang02-final-project
description: Most of us consume media recreationally, but it seems like the more we consume it, the more that already boundless pool expands. What have I already seen, and what have I dropped? When did I watch it, and what did I think of it? What new (or old) movies or shows look interesting, and how can I keep track of them?

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd front-end && npm install && npm run build
